docs.snippet: Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton leads Republican rival Donald Trump by 4 percentage points, and her recent bout with pneumonia doesn't appear to have scared away her supporters, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos opinion poll. &...
docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton leads Republican rival Donald Trump by 4 percentage points, and her recent bout with pneumonia doesn't appear to have scared away her supporters, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos opinion poll.

headline.main: Clinton Leads Trump as Americans Shrug Off Her Pneumonia Scare: Reuters/Ipsos Poll
headline.print_headline: Clinton Leads Trump as Americans Shrug Off Her Pneumonia Scare: Reuters/Ipsos Poll

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump on Friday abandoned his false claim that Barack Obama was not born in the United States after spending five years peddling conspiracy theories that the country's first African-American president started life as a foreigner.

headline.main: Trump Finally Backs Off Obama Birth Claim, Falsely Says Clinton Started It
headline.print_headline: Trump Finally Backs Off Obama Birth Claim, Falsely Says Clinton Started It

docs.snippet: After five years as the chief promoter of a lie about Barack Obama's birthplace, Donald Trump abruptly reversed course Friday and acknowledged the fact that the president was born in America. He then immediately peddled another false conspiracy....
